languages.text: {n}Лицо Кибеллы странно смягчается.{/n} "Встречать смерть надо с легким сердцем, ибо она — дар. Раз Вил'Джай может обрести легкость лишь в праздном возлиянии, за которым последует жестокая, мучительная смерть — поможем ей".

{n}Kibellah's expression becomes strangely soft.{/n} "One should meet their death with an easy heart, for death is a gift. If Vil'Jae can only put her heart at ease through idle libations before she faces a violent death, let us help her."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Кибеллы странно смягчается.{/n} "Встречать смерть надо с легким сердцем, ибо она — дар. Раз Вил'Джай может обрести легкость лишь в праздном возлиянии, за которым последует жестокая, мучительная смерть — поможем ей".

{n}Kibellah's expression becomes strangely soft.{/n} "One should meet their death with an easy heart, for death is a gift. If Vil'Jae can only put her heart at ease through idle libations before she faces a violent death, let us help her."

languages.text: {n}La expresión de Kibellah se vuelve extrañamente amable.{/n} «Hay que recibir la muerte con el corazón en paz, pues es un don. Si Vil'Jae solo puede tranquilizar su corazón mediante la bebida antes de enfrentarse a una muerte violenta, ayudémosla».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's expression becomes strangely soft.{/n} "One should meet their death with an easy heart, for death is a gift. If Vil'Jae can only put her heart at ease through idle libations before she faces a violent death, let us help her."

traits.locale_text: {n}La expresión de Kibellah se vuelve extrañamente amable.{/n} «Hay que recibir la muerte con el corazón en paz, pues es un don. Si Vil'Jae solo puede tranquilizar su corazón mediante la bebida antes de enfrentarse a una muerte violenta, ayudémosla».

languages.text: {n}キベラの表情が妙に柔らかくなる。{/n}「死は優しい気持ちで向かい入れるべきです。死は贈り物なのだから。もしヴィルジェイが激しい死に直面する前に、偶発的な祝杯でしか心を落ち着かせることができないのなら、彼女を助けましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's expression becomes strangely soft.{/n} "One should meet their death with an easy heart, for death is a gift. If Vil'Jae can only put her heart at ease through idle libations before she faces a violent death, let us help her."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラの表情が妙に柔らかくなる。{/n}「死は優しい気持ちで向かい入れるべきです。死は贈り物なのだから。もしヴィルジェイが激しい死に直面する前に、偶発的な祝杯でしか心を落ち着かせることができないのなら、彼女を助けましょう」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈的表情变得异常柔和。{/n}“人们应当坦然面对死亡，因为死亡是祂的礼物。如果敌者婕伊在面对惨烈的死亡之前，只能通过毫无意义的酒精饮料放松心灵，那不如让我们帮她一把。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's expression becomes strangely soft.{/n} "One should meet their death with an easy heart, for death is a gift. If Vil'Jae can only put her heart at ease through idle libations before she faces a violent death, let us help her."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈的表情变得异常柔和。{/n}“人们应当坦然面对死亡，因为死亡是祂的礼物。如果敌者婕伊在面对惨烈的死亡之前，只能通过毫无意义的酒精饮料放松心灵，那不如让我们帮她一把。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellahs Ausdruck wird merkwürdig weich.{/n} "Man sollte dem Tod mit leichtem Herzen begegnen, denn der Tod ist ein Geschenk. Wenn Vil'Jae ihr Herz nur durch Getränke erleichtern kann, bevor sie sich einem grausamen Tod stellt, sollten wir ihr helfen."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's expression becomes strangely soft.{/n} "One should meet their death with an easy heart, for death is a gift. If Vil'Jae can only put her heart at ease through idle libations before she faces a violent death, let us help her."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellahs Ausdruck wird merkwürdig weich.{/n} "Man sollte dem Tod mit leichtem Herzen begegnen, denn der Tod ist ein Geschenk. Wenn Vil'Jae ihr Herz nur durch Getränke erleichtern kann, bevor sie sich einem grausamen Tod stellt, sollten wir ihr helfen."

languages.text: {n}Étonnamment, l'expression de Kibellah se radoucit.{/n} « On devrait toujours braver la mort le cœur léger, car c'est un don du ciel. Si les libations oiseuses sont le seul moyen pour Vil'Jae d'apaiser son âme avant d'affronter une fin violente, autant faire notre possible pour l'y aider. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's expression becomes strangely soft.{/n} "One should meet their death with an easy heart, for death is a gift. If Vil'Jae can only put her heart at ease through idle libations before she faces a violent death, let us help her."

traits.locale_text: {n}Étonnamment, l'expression de Kibellah se radoucit.{/n} « On devrait toujours braver la mort le cœur léger, car c'est un don du ciel. Si les libations oiseuses sont le seul moyen pour Vil'Jae d'apaiser son âme avant d'affronter une fin violente, autant faire notre possible pour l'y aider. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah'nın yüzü, alışılmadık derecede yumuşak bir ifadeye bürünüyor.{/n} "Kişinin ölümü huzurla karşılaması gerekir. Zira ölüm bir armağandır. Eğer ki Vil'Jae, vahşi bir ölümle karşılaşmadan önce amaçsızca içerek gönlünü huzura kavuşturabiliyorsa ona yardım edelim."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's expression becomes strangely soft.{/n} "One should meet their death with an easy heart, for death is a gift. If Vil'Jae can only put her heart at ease through idle libations before she faces a violent death, let us help her."
